Class MyHTTPFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unifi.rc.httpserver.m5765968.MyHTTPFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HTTPFactory

    public class MyHTTPFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements HTTPFactory
    This class implements the HTTPFactory interface with the respective methods for creating objects.
    Author:
    Mattia D'Autilia

      HTTPInputStream getHTTPInputStream(java.io.InputStream is)
      Given an InputStream returns an instance of HTTPInputStream that can be used to read HTTP requests/replies.
      HTTPOutputStream getHTTPOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream os)
      Given an OutputStream returns an instance of HTTPOutputStream that can be used to write HTTP requests/replies.
      HTTPServer getHTTPServer(int port, int backlog, java.net.InetAddress address, HTTPHandler... handlers)
      Creates a HTTPServer listening at address:port with a given backlog.
      HTTPHandler getProxyHandler()
      Creates a HTTPHandler implementing a proxy.
